text: Agustín Fabián Bindella (born 5 March 2001) is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a defender for Quilmes. ==Career== Bindella started his senior career with Primera B Nacional's Quilmes. Marcelo Fuentes promoted Bindella into their first-team set-up for a fixture with Villa Dálmine in October 2018, with the defender featuring for thirty-four minutes of a 1–1 home draw. On 1 March 2019, Bindella completed a loan move to Primera División side Independiente; initially linking up with their reserves.
